agentTeamSettings.title: Agent Teams
agentTeamSettings.description: Configure multi-agent team coordination for collaborative task execution.
agentTeamSettings.enableTeamsDesc: Allow creating and running multi-agent teams that coordinate to solve complex tasks.
agentTeamSettings.executionModeDesc: How teammates collaborate by default when executing tasks.
agentTeamSettings.maxTeammatesDesc: Maximum number of teammates allowed per team.
agentTeamSettings.defaultTimeoutDesc: Maximum execution time per teammate before timeout.
agentTeamSettings.maxStepsDesc: Maximum number of agent steps each teammate can execute.
agentTeamSettings.autoApprovePlansDesc: Automatically approve task decomposition plans without manual review.
agentTeamSettings.enableMessagingDesc: Allow teammates to send messages to each other during execution.
agentTeamSettings.contextIsolationDesc: Automatically shut down teammates when all tasks are completed.
agentTeamSettings.templatesDesc: Pre-configured team compositions for common scenarios.
agentTeamSettings.noTeamsYet: No teams have been created yet. Create a team from the chat interface to get started.
agentTeamSettings.cleanupDesc: This will permanently remove {count} completed/failed/cancelled team(s) and their data.
agentTeamSettings.resetAllDesc: Clear all teams, teammates, tasks, and messages. Templates will be preserved.
agentTeamSettings.resetDesc: This will clear all teams, teammates, tasks, and messages. Built-in templates will be preserved. This action cannot be undone.
agentTeamSettings.deleteTemplateDesc: This will permanently delete this custom template. This action cannot be undone.
